channel.title: Creating a Right-Click Menu?

item.title: Creating a Right-Click Menu?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Hey all… I’m editing the Shop system a guy made on Rune-Server… And I’m adding selling. Problem is, I don’t know what values to send for the right menu. I’ve taken this code and edited it… It’s the Deposit Menu when banking.

p.stream.createFrame(223); p.stream.writeWord(27); p.stream.writeWordBigEndianA(0); p.stream.writeWordBigEndian(0); p.stream.writeWordBigEndian(763); p.stream.writeWordBigEndian(1150); p.stream.writeWordBigEndian(18);

And the only thing I’ve found that changes the menu items was the 1150 value… Editing the other values either does nothing, removes the options, or I get dced. I know that the createFrame creates the menu and I’m guessing the other stuff is some sort of word bank… And determines the items.

Honestly I have no idea what I’m doing and tired of experimenting. There must be an easier way to find the values for the shop menus (Buying and Selling).

If I’m wrong about anything, don’t be a dick about it. I was just guessing.

Thanks for helping.

~Lin

Read full topic
